text: In 1992 I could from inside confirm that Cuban health service was very good and that reported mortality numbers were surprisingly correct.
I convinced Castro! Studies with skilled Cuban collegues Showed that the nerve lesions were caused by poor diet due to rigid planned economy
My work in Cuba started with long discussion/quarrel with Fidel Castro re my request to use antropological methods due grasp the food crisis
As invited epidemiologist to Cuba during 3 months in 1992 I led local studies of the huge epidemic of neuropathy in Pinar del Rio Province.
